statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE chatbot_id = 1;
SELECT chatbot_name, chatbot_type FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE message LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT chatbot_id, chatbot_name, last_interaction FROM CustomerServiceChatbots ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT chatbot_type FROM CustomerServiceChatbots;
SELECT chatbot_name, chatbot_type FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE chatbot_type = 'AI'
SELECT chatbot_name, last_interaction FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE last_interaction > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT chatbot_id, customer_id, message FROM CustomerServiceChatbots WHERE customer_id = 1234
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceChatbots ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT DISTINCT chatbot_type FROM CustomerServiceChatbots
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount
FROM customers
INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT *
FROM products
WHERE price > 100
ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name, products.price
FROM customers
INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
INNER JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id
WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE '%John%'
ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC, products.price ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount
FROM customers
LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
WHERE orders.total_amount > 500
ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, SUM(orders.total_amount) AS total_sales
FROM products
INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.order_id
GROUP BY products.product_name
ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Order WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT order_date, quantity, product_id FROM 'Order' ORDER BY quantity DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT name, price, category FROM Product WHERE price > 50.00 AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT conversation_id, chatbot_response FROM ChatbotConversations WHERE conversation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
